entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Lies,the reports parameters were changed as it states in the report. The 2.5 millions jobs are unemployed people going back to their jobs after reopening after losing them from covid19. More bullshit spin from a Fake President and a corrupt administration.
